descp2: array-like, with shape (n_samples,), optional Labels to constrain permutation within groups, i.e. ``y`` values are permuted among samples with the same group identifier. When not specified, ``y`` values are permuted among all samples. When a grouped cross-validator is used, the group labels are also passed on to the ``split`` method of the cross-validator. The cross-validator uses them for grouping the samples  while splitting the dataset into train/test set.
